name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in **cloud-native development**, specializing in **C#** and the **.NET framework**. Proficient in designing and implementing **microservices** architecture and **RESTful APIs**, utilizing strong **object-oriented programming (OOP)** techniques. Adept at managing **NoSQL databases** and **SQL Server**, with practical experience in **asynchronous programming** and **multithreading**. Skilled in using **Git**, **CI/CD tools**, and **automated testing frameworks** to maintain software quality and accelerate development cycles.

Fluent in modern web technologies, including **JavaScript**, **React**, **Angular**, and **HTML/CSS**, I excel in delivering user-centric applications. Expertise in monitoring and performance visualization with tools like **Datadog** and **Grafana**, combined with a solid understanding of **Identity and Access Management (IAM)**, **OAuth**, **JWT**, and other security protocols.

My robust background in agile development, along with strong **problem-solving**, **communication**, and **collaboration** skills, ensure the successful delivery of high-performance solutions in fast-paced environments. Additionally, I have experience with **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and cloud platforms such as **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, enabling me to contribute effectively to innovative projects.
